item.title: Accessing Oracle DB from Dyalog APL in Linux using SQAPL
item.description: Install Oracle ODBC driver as it’s described in Installation of Oracle ODBC driver in Linux. Make Dyalog APL aware of ODBC and Oracle configurations: echo 'export ODBCINI=/etc/odbc.ini' >> ~/.dyalog/dyalog.config echo 'export TNS_ADMIN='$TNS_ADMIN >> ~/.
